title: The mute mechanic
body:
Hi Riot, 

I'm wondering if its possible that when you mute someone in game, it can be changed to carry on over into the postgame chat as well like it used to?
So many games I've had to straight up mute people who've ruined the game for me, so I mute and ignore but after post-game it unmutes them and instantly on the back about anything.

Dealt with the community 4 years and it's just horrible

ty
